::Ramulus::

Ramulus frowns. "That's a strange entrance," he says, not sure if he should 
try to confort Brix and Fliq about the lost crew.

He shruggs at Fliq's question. "I'm not sure. From my experience, when I 
died, Liono put my body in a CR chamber, and it was forgotten for nearly a 
month. Then a powersurge at the Ark must have somehow brought my spark back. 
I've checked the computer logs, that power surge was the only think that 
happened since I was put in the CR, so it must have caused it."

Deep in thought, Ramulus was now forgetting about his space sickness, his 
mind on the matter at hand.
